General.Name: Ligitek Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Ligitek Electronics Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells various optoelectronic components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers light-emitting-diode (LED) products, such as through hole LEDs, PCB type surface-mount device (SMD), PLCC SMDs, leads type SMDs, invisible LEDs, automotive LEDs, ambient light sensors, smart LEDs, arrays, SMD type displays, LED displays, dot matrixes, and LED back lights. Its products are used in the LED lighting, mass transit and MRT system, automobile and motorcycle LED module, UVC LED sterilizer, customized lighting, imaging lighting infrared module products and ODM, UV module group product and ODM, solar energy, and e-bike applications. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 238, Bo-Ai Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 238
